title: A mini industry spawns under the hood of a booming car market
description: India's car market is booming, with passenger vehicle sales and the used car market both experiencing significant growth. The used car market is expected to reach $100 billion by 2034, driven by demand in metropolitan cities and the digitization of the business.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
